text: Va niz Alloh ta'olo xalq kard corpojone, ki ʙor meʙarand va ʙar onho savor mesaved va ʙarxe ʙa saʙaʙi in ki xurdand ʙaroi savor sudan va ʙaroi ʙorʙardori salohijat nadorand, misli ʙacai suturho va monandi on. Pas harom nasumored az on ci Alloh ʙa sumo onro halol ruzi dodaast, ʙixured va ʙa sajton pajravi makuned, ki hamono sajton dusmani oskori sumost
